Desc.eng: You’ve brought me flowers! That’s nice. It’s a pity that they’ll go straight into my boiling cauldron. Stay a little while and you can taste the magical potion.
Ah! That’s nice. I’m right in the middle of preparing a magical concoction. I could use some lilies. Stay a while and you can taste the magical concoction.
This conversation makes me shudder. And I’m a ghost!
And… the potions are ready. Which one would you like to taste?
I fancy this stinky, seething blue slop. (+15 Mana, -25 Hp)
This concoction looks like coagulated blood. Give it to me. (+40 Hp, -15 Mana)
There is one with the color of bile. It must be a really potent drink. (+6 ability points, -20 Hp, -12 Mana)
You know what? No thanks, I’ll pass. I might turn into a frog.
I found these... strange... flowers. I thought... well... that you might be able to use them for something.
